## shuffle() function

Randomly shuffle an array using Fisher-Yates (aka Knuth) algorithm.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function shuffle<T>(array: Array<T>): Array<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Array&lt;T&gt; | The array to shuffle |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;T&gt;

A shuffled copy of original array
